data.title: Best burger and steaks around
data.text: Love going to Mutt's it a very nice local hang out with friendly staff and great food. Sunday Funday with $5 burgers and fries is a must if your in Lorain. Everything on the menu is fantastic. :)

data.title: nice pub atmosphere
data.text: Went there with 3 others and we all ordered something different.  Food was good and reasonably priced.

data.title: bar food at it's best,
data.text: variety of different bar foods,so far all that I have eaten have been tasty,right blend of spices and hot, the burger and fried egg was great,fries crispy and hot,soup great

data.title: A blast from my past!
data.text: Mutt and Jeff's has been in Lorain forever, and on my last visit to my hometown, my mom and I stopped in for drinks and apps.  The chicken wings are very, very good as were the pretzels.  But I have to say, the best deal are the drinks.  Hers was only about $3 and mine was about $5. Living in the Chicago area, that NEVER happens!  It was also karaoke night and we had a few laughs watching that go down!

data.title: Neighborhood people and atomosphere
data.text: Under newer management for the past few years... run by younger guys who certainly have made a go of it. They changed a lot of the food items offered.... which made me think why mess with success... .but I think that they wanted to make a name for themselves. The locals hang out there... entertainment on the weekends... booming place in the summer and for Northeast Ohio sporting events viewing. I did have the chance to sample their cuisine at a fundraiser which was very good! The quality of food and presentation were nice.

data.title: Order a Burger or Wings
data.text:
I made the mistake of ordering a turkey reuben.   Lousy turkey, sweet sauce and odd bread.   My friends ordered burgers and wings and were happy with their choices.    The menu is fairly limited, but it is bar food, so that is to be expected.

Atmosphere is nothing special.  They have a decent beer selection and service was very good.

data.title: Mutt & Jeffs, a great place for OUTSTANDING burgers
data.text: A great place for a GREAT burger. If you like burgers, you have to put Mutt & Jeff's on your ' to do" list. All of their burgers are top notch. On the weekends, they have live entertainment. The also have great specials, try their wings, excellent! Not a place for kids. On weekend evenings, they are packed, not only for the food but also the entertainment.

data.title: More than bar food
data.text: Still one of the better eating experiences in Lorain.  Good burgers, sandwiches, wings usual bar grub.  Tasty specials and entrees.  Enjoy with a cold beer, soda or whatever hits your taste buds.

data.title: What a cesspool!
data.text: My wife an I had the fish and it was decent at best. However when i saw 3 bloody syringes in the bathroom I almost died. What a hell hole!

data.title: Here's where to go for lunch
data.text: Nice specials, sandwiches, meals and soups. Everything is always fresh and flavorful and accompany that with a cold drink you can't go wrong.

data.title: Truly outstanding food in a so-so environment
data.text: The food at Mutt n Jeff's is as good as it gets. Seriously, I have had dishes there that belonged in a four star restaurant.  The place itself is a bit run down, but don't let that keep you away from some of the best meals you can have in Northeast Ohio.  The daily soups are creative and very good, if at times a bit salty, but that is the only complaint I have about the food.  Blackened chicken, salads, grouper, daily specials, ribs, steaks, grilled veggies, all sorts of burgers (and chicken can be done any way a burger is prepared) you name it, it's all delicious.  This food deserves to be in a nice location/building, but it isn't- and it doesn't matter, I go there all the time anyway.

data.title: What happenend??
data.text: What happened? You no longer care about fine food and service was minimal;  we have working on our sobriety as you get served one drink and then you're on your own to go to the bar for the second.  Your top staff is absent or have found other employment.  Sorry to quit you M&J; we've been loyal customers for over 15 years.  Take care and good luck in your changed business venture.  $22 for a dried up pork chop, dios mio!

data.title: Food and Fun
data.text: A bar/restaurant place. Great tasting food. Sometimes live entertainment. Inside and outside dining when weather permits

data.title: Another best kept secret in Lorain
data.text: Don't like to advertise our favorite places because they will be overcrowded and we'll never get a reservation (even though they are not mandatory).  Staff really cares; over the top service and unique food that is several cuts above what you'd consider as pub food.

data.title: Creative specials, great soup, friendly service
data.text: Do not let the outside of the building or the decor deter you from visiting- Mutt 'n Jeff's has consistently great food and wonderful service (thank you Holli, you're the best!).  We visit here for lunch at least two times a week, and also go for dinner on occasion.  The food is what you would find in a more upscale eatery- great soups, specials, and sandwiches.  You can have any specialty burger made with a chicken breast in it's place- an outstanding option!  The twice baked wings are outstanding.  There is usually a choice of several soups, and some of them (the beer cheese, spicy creole,  and potato leek, just to name a few) are so good we wish they would be a permanent menu choice.  The salads are fresh and delicious.  I have really never had any complaints about anything I've ever eaten here, except that once in awhile the soups have a bit too much salt.  If you haven't tried Mutt 'n Jeff's lately- you should!

data.title: Good Service and Good Food
data.text: Our Active Adult Community has a group (including yours truly) that goes out every Wednesday evening for dinner.  We have a list of about 6 or 7 places we like to go and Mutt and Jeffs is one of our favorites.  The burgers are big and tasty and the dry Cajun rub wings are excellent.  When the ribs are on special you have to try them. We have a regular waitress (Tracy) who provides excellent service to our group.  The prices are very reasonable.

data.title: Great neighborhood bar and restaurant
data.text: Mutt and Jeffs is a well established neighborhood dive bar with great food.  I have been frequenting Mutts since it opened in the 80s and keep going back.  They are open  for lunch and dinner with a late night menu of appetizers as well.  Don't hesitate to try Mutt and Jeffs, you will thoroughly enjoy it!
